company_info.Company Description: LEADING TRAVEL COMPANY REQUIRED ASST. MANAGER--TICKETING AT GUNTUR........................................

jd_information.description: Qualification: Degree or PGExperience : 8+ Years (Should have the knowledge of International & Domestic Ticketing)CTC: 30,000/-Location : GunturJob Profile:Experience in issuance of domestic and International travel for clients, including air, hotel, rail, and ground transportationAttend query on phone/in person/E-mailsRe issue, refund, Issue Travel InsuranceGood written & verbal communication skillGroup booking.Providing customer service via Telephone and E-mail SEND CV AT  victorapply@gmail.com
